item.title: 첫 번째 포스트입니다.
item.description: Markdown is a way to style text on the web. You control the display of the document;formatting words as bold or italic, addinf images , and creating lists are just a few of the things we can do wiht Makrdown. Mostly, Markdown is just regular text with a few non-alphabetic characters thrown in, like # or * . HEADERS # This is an <h1> tag ## This is an <h2> tag ###### This is an <h3> tag This is an <h1> tag This is an <h2> tag This is an <h3> tag
